item.description:
B.F.A. First Friday
Friday Aug. 5th.
anytime between
7:00 — 9:30 pm
Boston Museum of fine Arts
Avenue of the Arts
465 Huntington Avenue,
Boston, MA 02115-5597
(617) 267-9300
Special Events
mfafirstfridays Koch Gallery

Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net
Carpooling from Nashua at 5:30 pm..
Then Lowell, Burlington on down.
Open to visitors 21 years or older.
Members: entry is FREE
Nonmembers: entry is FREE with Museum admission $20.
Also: Free or discount tickets may be found at your local library.

     Steve O. and friends would like the honor of your company as they enjoy drinks on a stroll through these magnificent museum and it's galleries. There will be the Los Three Latin Trio, an open bar. and food for sale. The food and drinks are not very good, and they are pricey. But, if you enjoy museums? You will find it even better with a drink, as you view the works of art around you. The event opens at 5:30 pm.. But, Steve O. can not make there much before 7 pm. So, if you can get there before us and hold a table and some seats? That would help give us some place to meet. If we can't do that. We will be on the left side of the gallery by the band, with signs on our table. They may have it out side in the court yard. So again, we will be by the band.
Can't make at 7:00? Then join us anytime until 9:30. The event starts at 5:30 pm.. But, Steve O can not make it any sooner than 7.  Call for more info. on carpooling of finding us.
The Museum wrote:
Begin each month in a unique and stylish atmosphere at mfafirstfridays. Join us in the Koch Gallery for fine art, live music, cash bars featuring a signature cocktail, and delicious tapas. Relax and unwind in the breathtaking ambiance with friends both old and new.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Museum of Arts First Friday
